quotes.quote: Never let suspects stay together.
quotes.author: Gibbs' Rule #1

quotes.quote: Never screw over your partner.
quotes.author: Gibbs' Rule #1

quotes.quote: Always wear gloves at a crime scene.
quotes.author: Gibbs' Rule #2

quotes.quote: Don't believe what you're told. Double check.
quotes.author: Gibbs' Rule #3

quotes.quote: Never be unreachable.
quotes.author: Gibbs' Rule #3

quotes.quote: The best way to keep a secret? Keep it to yourself. Second best? Tell one other person - if you must. There is no third best.
quotes.author: Gibbs' Rule #4

quotes.quote: You don't waste good.
quotes.author: Gibbs' Rule #5

quotes.quote: Never apologize. It's a sign of weakness.
quotes.author: Gibbs' Rule #6

quotes.quote: Always be specific when you lie.
quotes.author: Gibbs' Rule #7

quotes.quote: Never take anything for granted.
quotes.author: Gibbs' Rule #8

quotes.quote: Never go anywhere without a knife.
quotes.author: Gibbs' Rule #9

quotes.quote: Never get personally involved on a case
quotes.author: Gibbs' Rule #10

quotes.quote: When the job is done, walk away.
quotes.author: Gibbs' Rule #11

quotes.quote: Never date a coworker.
quotes.author: Gibbs' Rule #12

quotes.quote: Never ever involve lawyers.
quotes.author: Gibbs' Rule #13

quotes.quote: Always work as a team.
quotes.author: Gibbs' Rule #15

quotes.quote: It's better to seek forgiveness than ask permission.
quotes.author: Gibbs' Rule #18

quotes.quote: Never, ever bother Gibbs in interrogation.
quotes.author: Gibbs' Rule #22

quotes.quote: Never mess with a Marine's coffee if you want to live.
quotes.author: Gibbs' Rule #23

quotes.quote: There are two ways to follow: First way is "they never notice you." Second way is "they only notice you."
quotes.author: Gibbs' Rule #27

quotes.quote: Always watch the watchers.
quotes.author: Gibbs' Rule #35

quotes.quote: Your case, your lead.
quotes.author: Gibbs' Rule #38

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as a coincidence.
quotes.author: Gibbs' Rule #39

quotes.quote: If it seems like someone's out to get you, they are.
quotes.author: Gibbs' Rule #40

quotes.quote: Never apologize to someone who just sucker punched you.
quotes.author: Gibbs' Rule #42

quotes.quote: First things first, hide the women and the children.
quotes.author: Gibbs' Rule #44

quotes.quote: Clean up your messes.
quotes.author: Gibbs' Rule #45

quotes.quote: Sometimes, you're wrong.
quotes.author: Gibbs' Rule #51

quotes.quote: Never trust a woman who doesn't trust her man.
quotes.author: Gibbs' Rule #69

quotes.quote: You do what you have to for family
quotes.author: Gibbs' Unspoken Rule.
